attributes.action: Make the Football Association give the FA Cup back to the fans
attributes.additional_details:
*Moving games for overseas viewing
*The cup being sponsored
*Semi-Finals at Wembley 
*Scrapping replays 
*Round draws whilst games going on
*Final moving KO time
attributes.background:
The FA Cup has always been one of the oldest & proudest cup competitions in world football, let alone the UK. 
The governing body of football (The FA) are destroying the magic of the cup with changes the supporters do not want. 
Enough is enough.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue: 
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us
